Definition.WordDefinition: video n 1: the visible part of a television transmission; "they could still receive the sound but the picture was gone" [syn: {picture}] 2: a recording of both the video and audio components (especially one containing a recording of a movie or television program) [syn: {video recording}] 3: broadcasting visual images of stationary or moving objects; "she is a star of screen and video"; "Television is a medium because it is neither rare nor well done" - Ernie Kovacs [syn: {television}, {telecasting}, {TV}]
